learning_objectives.description: Understand what an input device is and why it is used.
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Examples: barcode scanner, digital camera, keyboard, microphone, optical mouse, QR scanner, touch screens (resistive/capacitive/infra-red), 2D/3D scanners.

learning_objectives.description: Understand what an output device is and why it is used.
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Examples: actuator, DLP projector, inkjet/laser printer, LED/LCD screen/projector, speaker, 3D printer.

description: (b) Identify data captured and suitable scenario for each sensor.
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Types: acoustic, accelerometer, flow, gas, humidity, infra-red, level, light, magnetic field, moisture, pH, pressure, proximity, temperature.
